title: Rank potential difference between charged plates

content.question: Points R, S, T, and U are located between the plates as shown in the figure above, with points R and T equidistant from point S. Let VRS , VST , VTU, and VRU be the magnitudes of the electric potential differences between the pairs of points. How do the magnitudes of these potential differences compare?

skill.text: 2.C: Compare physical quantities between two or more scenarios or at different times and locations in a single scenario.
